publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-457.1 Jeremy Purvis: Educationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-457) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end "and further calls for an early announcement on when the SNP manifesto pledge for a 50% increase in free nursery education for 3 and 4-year-olds will be met and how much it will cost."
